lines.name: Locke
lines.text: That's strange... I haven't seen Tai at all recently.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Usually he's free on Saturday, but I wasn't able to contact him at all.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: His last message on Ribbitter was pretty cryptic too.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But I guess he's just been pretty busy lately.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ......No, that wouldn't happen. Tai's always been a pretty responsible guy.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: He's a year younger than me, but he's always seemed more mature.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: The amount of times he's had to bail me out of trouble has been... more than I want to count.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: He HAS felt pretty distant lately though.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I get that editing can be a pretty stressful job but...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It feels like there's something else he's been hiding from me...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: No good. I can't work with all this worrying...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Did something happen with Power Traingers?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I mean, I don't think Trainger Yellow actually died, Tai would have looked more devastated during the live performance.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Maybe I'll actually do some more research on the show. I've fallen really behind on the episodes.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Alright, commencing WONDER ZONE: FULL DIVE. START!
